text.section:
If the applicable assets of the estate are insufficient to pay all claims in full, the personal representative shall make payment of claims in the following order:
Costs and expenses of administration; then
Funeral expenses; then
Debts and taxes with preference under federal law and other laws of this state; then
All other claims.
No preference shall be given in the payment of any claim over any other claim of the same class, and a matured claim shall not be entitled to a preference over unmatured claims.

law.history: Created 1988 Ky. Acts ch. 90, sec. 15, effective July 15, 1988.
